miic.core.miic_utils.add_var_to_dict¶

add_var_to_dict(key, variable, dictionary=None)[source]¶

Add a variable to a dictionary.

Add a variable to a dictionary as value associated to the key key.

Parameters:
  • dictionary (dict) – dictionary to which the variable should be added. If None a new dictionary is created.
  • key (str) – name of the key to which the vradiable is to be associated with.

:param data that should be added to the dictionary

Return type:dict
Returns:dictionary: extended or new dictionary.
